headline: River Road Asset Management Addresses UniFirst Board Regarding Shareholder Concerns
summary: LOUISVILLE, Ky., Dec. 05, 2025 (GLOBE NEWSWIRE) -- River Road Asset Management LLC (“River Road”), on behalf of its clients, owns approximately 881,000 Class A common shares of UniFirst (UNF), which represents 6.0% of the Class A shares and a 4.9% total ownership interest in the company. River Road is a value-oriented institutional equity manager with over $10 billion in total assets under management. We have been patient UniFirst shareholders since 2010.
